name: Mashadi's Way Home
description:
Mashadi,Lost in galaxy, on his way to Find his own galaxy , his own planet , his own place , where he belongs.

Controls[Important[:

  • Mouse Left click on Mashadi to make him prepare for the launch.
  • then decide the direction with mouse and Right click to launch Mashadi.
  • Click on Esc to return to home screen from any levels and trial room
  • Press "R"  to restart any level
  • long Press "v" to enable "view-mode" which allows you to see the whole level using  directional buttons.Releasing 'v' button will disable view-mode.
  • Its a game based on where the failure gives you more progress athan the vise-versa.So thinking out of the box may lead you to more success :3

Game Basics:

In the main game, you are given certain amount of "boost" and "try".each time you die, you loose a "try".each time you boost , you loose a "boost". There are many checkpoints which saves your covered distance and booster-count..So if you die after a certain checkpoint you will respwan at that check-point with the saved booster-count..Where comes the twist.Your main objective is to make Mashadi reach her home.You can try and boost as long as you don't have any..Now how will you do it? Well its up to you!

Good luck and hope you will enjoy the game..have fun!
